node.text: -Step right up, wandering soul.
-Where am I?
-What does the coin tell you?
-It whispers… Am I dead?
-Looks like your riches couldn’t save you.
Get in and watch your step.
-Just hurry up and get me to the other side.
How long does it take to get there?
-It depends on you.
-What is this?
-Memories. Feelings. Something that prevents you from passing.
Remember friendship? All those people, who helped you get to the top?
-I… I don’t. How could I forget?
-What about love? Does your memory treasure the moments you’ve spent with her?
-I do not remember! Why can’t I remember?
-Remember your son.
-Stop.
-So you do remember him.
-Now I remember. There is no point in moving forward.
-No point in staying here either. Not only you’ll be trapped with this imagery.
But you’ll never get to the other side.
